text: János Koppány (February 13, 1908 – 1972) was a Hungarian field handball player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Hungarian field handball team, which finished fourth in the Olympic tournament. He played four matches. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Hungary Category:Field handball players at the 1936 Summer Olympics
title: János Koppány
